Name: Discovering Colors - Animals
About the game: This application can be used by a child without the help of an adult, but remember that the interaction you have while playing with them is the best educational gift a child can receive . Discovering Colors - Animals features: - 12 drawings which come alive when the child colors them in! - 4 additional drawings to unlock. - A free painting mode. Ideas and tips: - Parents should join in on the first few plays. - Learn color names by saying them aloud! - Talk about the kinds of animals the child is bringing to life.
